free_text.Learning outcomes: The theory of quadratic forms over arbitrary fields is a very active topic, many new results were proved recently. The aim of the course is to give an introduction to this subject.
free_text.Content: - Basic notions[br/]- Witt's cancellation theorem[br/]- Witt ring[br/]- Pfister forms[br/]- The level of a field[br/]- Base change and transfer[br/]- Hasse-Witt invariant[br/]- Galois descent[br/]- Generic methods[br/]- Perspectives.

en.title: Quadratic forms over fields
en.library_recommends:
• "Introduction to quadratic forms over fields / T.Y. Lam". Year:2005. ISBN:0-8218-1095-2
  • "Quadratic and hermitian forms / Winfried Scharlau". Year:1985. ISBN:3-540-13724-6

free_text.Contenu: - Notions fondamentales[br/]- Simplification de Witt[br/]- Anneau de Witt[br/]- Formes de Pfister[br/]- Niveau d'un corps[br/]- Extensions de scalaires et transfert[br/]- Invariant de Hosse-Witt[br/]- Descente galoisienne[br/]- Méthodes géométriques[br/]- Perspectives.
free_text.Bibliographie et matériel: Lam : Quadratic forms over fields[br/]Scharlau : Quadratic and hermitian forms
free_text.Objectifs d'apprentissage: La théorie des formes quadratiques sur des corps quelconques est actuellement en plein développement. Le but de ce cours est de donner une introduction à ce sujet.
